choices: I am a male, looking for females
I am a male, looking for males
I am a female, looking for females
I am a female, looking for females
Skip the storyline! I just want to pick a character and date them!
1.content:
Welcome to the Predatory Dating Service!

         We're so glad you decided to accept our invitation, new user! All that's left to do is click on the registration link below, and you'll be able to interact and pair up with amazing men and women1 from all around the known universe!




You cautiously hover over the link before opening it. A new tab on your browser pops open, taking you straight to your account. The site proudly exclaims "WELCOME NEW USER" in colorful font above a surprisingly small form to fill out. It just seems to want your gender and what genders you're looking for. How odd.

Footnotes
1  Definition of "men and women" may vary.
1.title: The PDS' newest member

choices: Question these three about the site
11.content:
The site seems to freeze up momentarily when you insert your information, before suddenly dropping you into what seems to be a chat room. Odd, you didn't even get to put in an actual screen name, it just says "you" whenever you put something in.



You: Umm... Hello? The site just dropped me in here.

DigitalFox1: Ah, seems the PDS caught another lonely man.

TAOCONFUSED: Already? That was fast.

TopVamp: That's no reason to be rude you two. Greetings newblood. It seems the site figured that this would be the best place for you to start, but feel free to browse the site regardless, the navbar should appear for you soon.



Almost as soon as you finish reading "TopVamp's" post, a navbar pops up on the top of the screen, allowing you access to the full site. The first few you notice are "My Portfolio" "Interested in Me" "Find a Match" and "Explore." Something feels fishy though...
11.title: Male looking for Females

choices: Log out, this is too weird
12.content:
The site pauses momentarily. A security pop-up barely warns you in time that the site is attempted to access your webcam before a soft *click* sounds from your speakers, and the site redirects you to a profile in the making. A picture of you, as you are right now, already the profile image.

"H-Hey! Wait!" You try clicking around, but to no avail, the profile seems to be making itself. It fills out your name, height, approximate weight... how is it getting all of this information?

Suddenly, a small window pops up, alerting you that you already have someone interested in your profile. This all feels extremely suspect... but the site seems to be registering your input now, and the navbar is waiting for you to use it... You're already on your own profile, so no need to worry about that option... There's "IRC Chat," "Interested in Me," and "Explore" currently available to you. As well as a red tab that appears on the navbar with an envelope. Hovering over it makes text appear. "One New Message"
12.title: Male looking for Males

125.content:
You quickly log out of the site. You have no idea WHAT you got into, but you have a bad feeling about it... After some browsing to get your mind off of it, you head to bed.

Your dreams that night are plagued with unusual themes. What games you like, what cartoons you were interested in as a kid... and what ones you are interested in as an adult, and so on. It feels almost like you're answering a questionnaire rather than dreaming...

--------------------------------


When you wake up, something feels... off. Your bedroom feels... smaller? You look around in confusion before walking out of the door to find that you certainly aren't in your house anymore... in fact, this room leads to someplace very different than your house...
125.title: Log out, this is too weird

1251.content: Pick a video game to wake up in.
1251.title: That unfortunate list

12511.content:
You seem to be in... some kind of pizza joint? Except there's no one here, and it's actually really dark in here. You cautiously grab a flashlight that was left near your door and walk in, looking around.

The whole place is dilapidated, looking like no one's been here in years... But at the same time, something feels familiar, and you have a foreboding feeling gnawing at the back of your mind. You wander for a while, eventually coming across a breaker panel laying unattended. You switch on the power.

Immediately, you hear the sound of the games in the pizza place's arcade switching on. Lights flick on, one after another, revealing the pizzeria as a whole. Then... a curtain opens and stage lights turn on, revealing the source of your foreboding feeling...
12511.title: Five Nights and Forever

choices: Run for it! Find an exit!
Hide! Get back to your room!
Trust Foxy and dive into the Cove!
125111.content:
The moment you see Freddy's band, you feel your stomach drop. Oh god, you are so dead, you're stuck in Fazbear's pizza. You turn to run the other way, but find Foxy peeking out of Pirate's Cove at you. He has his hook arm holding one curtain, with his other arm holding the other one open in a beckoning manner. None of the animatronics are moving yet... you could make a run for it. Or you could try to hide.

On the other hand, part of you wonders if Foxy is offering a way into Pirate's Cove for a reason. Maybe he's trying to help you?
125111.title: The original animatronics (FNAF 1)

choices: Foxy just wants you as a meal
He wants you for very SPECIAL reasons...
1251113.content:
You make a split-second decision and make a running dive into the cove. It's really just a small side stage, but at least it keeps you out of the way. Foxy lowers his arms and steps back in, the curtain closing and darkening the area. Your eyes take a second to adjust, but everything has a bit of a purple filter to it from the light passing through the curtain.

Foxy walks over to you and bends down, looking you over. He's... buffer than you remember him being in the games.

"You okay? Floor's not as smooth as it used to be."

You slowly nod. You're not hurt, so far anyway.

"Mmm... good." Foxy puts his good arm around you, pulling you into a comforting hug. He's surprisingly warm, and his fur is soft to the touch..."Sorry for spooking ya, lad."

He has a bit of a stereotypical pirate accent. You're not that surprised really.

"Glad you're here though!" He adds. "Been looking for someone for a while now."

"Wait, looking for someone?" You ask.

"On that site. Predatory Dating Service. See... I've got a need for you..."
1251113.title: Trust Foxy and dive into the Cove!

choices: Wait, no, the sound is coming from the computer
It's nothing, go back to bed
13.content:
At first, nothing seems to happen. You click submit a few more times to be safe, and then... nothing?

Wait no, there it goes.

Profile accepted, welcome to the PDS!

After that message you're sent to some kind of homepage. You browse the site for a while, soon finding a list of on-site reviews. It seems pretty standard at first, people saying that the site works, and how much fun they had on their first dates. All sorts of mushy stuff...

Eventually, you realize the site isn't giving you any messages. After checking your email to make sure it didn't send there, you shrug it off and head to bed. As you're about to fall asleep, you swear you hear a noise from the entryway. Just to be safe, you get up and go to check it out...
13.title: Female looking for Females

15.content:
Well, I guess that's fair...

How about this, pick a franchise or story or whatever, and you can start from there instead?
15.title: SKIP TO THE LIST!

151.content: Here's a couple games to start you off...
151.title: Video Game franchises

choices: Pick a FNaF game to use
All the animatronics as hot babes!
15132.content:
Five nights huh?

Well, here's an idea. How about you either pick one of the games and start a scenario in there... OR

Why don't we have some fun? Maybe all of the animatronics as hot chicks? As in ALL of them. (yes, even Springtrap)
15132.title: FNaF

info.brief_description: A dating site that caters to a very interesting clientele catches your eye.
info.description:
The Predatory Dating Service, or PDS, is an online dating service catering to a number of... let's go with "hungry" clients. Of course, that means we need pairs for them, and that's where you come in. You see, we have a bit of a need for pairs for our best clients, and humans- I mean PEOPLE like you make for great companions.

Rules and Misc Info-
The main fetish this interactive caters to is vore, of course, but feel free to add other ones. Hell, feel free to ignore fetishes altogether and write out long dating sequences. Just make sure to leave alt options too for branching paths!

ADD. More additions means more time on the front page, which means more additions, which means more to love!

Try to make decently readable additions, and preferably (though not necessarily) long ones. I'll try to be more lenient for this interactive than I have been for some of my others.

The majority of dates will be characters from various media. Video games, anime/manga, movies, comics... you name it! Don't worry too much about breaking character, as you're going to be writing them as hungry preds, ya know?

OCs are allowed to be dates, they'll have their own category. Feel free to add your own, but only if you're willing to write a chapter or two about them to start people off. No point in having a character that no one knows anything about.

The PDS has an on-site IRC chat, but make sure to give iconic characters recognizable screen names. E-mail me more subtle ones if you want, I can give questioning people hints that way. Oh, and be consistent, one character isn't going to have more than one screen name, and I'll be keeping a list in a private list for myself to keep track of the ones I know.

Other than all that, have fun and enjoy! That's the main purpose of this, after all!
